title: Rare Icon?
body:
Saw this icon for the first time today. Got told apparently you had to have brought a limited edition skin before they became legacy?

Is this correct?

replies.body:
Hey man,

Original Limited Edition skin owners will receive this exclusive summoner icon: more details below

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/plan-vintage-limited-edition-skins
Thanks for that Maraudaur :), any chance Riot Squad Singed is gonna come back. Been waiting for that skin for almost 5 years {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}.
I Dunno if its that rare mate.
I thought it was the icon you got for playing in Season 1, with the one sword in the middle, and other icons for S3 and 2 having like two glass swords or whatever they are, in the middle.

No, S1 has its own set of ranking icons (bronze, silver, gold, diamond. There was no plat/master/challenger, and bronze was the correspondant of current high silver/low gold so lots of people don't have it). Playing is S1 also gave everyone a special Kayle skin.

The icon he's talking about is a special Rito gave to certain customers for changing the terms of some exclusive skins (Kitty Kat Katarina, Definitely Not Blitzcrank, and such), together with custom loading screens and full price refund.
Can't really complain, i guess. I like my icon.
